ygData.subject: Re: EQ and Laptops
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/4/99 10:06:33 AM Pacific Daylight Time, MFerrulo@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/4/99 10:06:33 AM Pacific Daylight Time, MFerrulo@...
writes:

<<
I am going on the road for 2 weeks and may get a laptop so I can play while
travelling. Anyone ever see a EQ played on Laptop? Is it possible? Any
advice as to what kind of not to expensive laptop to get?

I do not expect the performance of my desk top - just something playable :)
>>

You're biggest problem is going to be the 3dfx card for video...as long as
you are at 166mhz and have a 3D card, it'll be slow...choppy...and you'll
have to hide in the dark to see anything...but you'll still be mainlining
EQ...;p
